name: Bell Of The Ball, Catherine Bell Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
August 14, 1968.

	Catherine was born in London, England to Peter and Mina. When she was three, she moved to California with her mother after her parents divorced.

Lisa.

	Catherine has two Italian greyhound dogs named Zoe and Leo. Sarah is the first name of her television character.

questions.text: In 2004, what was Catherine ranked in FHM's 100 Most Sexiest Women in the World?
questions.explanation:
20.

	Catherine has moved up the list in FHM magazine. In 2001, she was ranked #84 and #38 in 2002.

questions.text: Before becoming a model and actress, what did Catherine want to become?
questions.explanation:
Doctor.

	Catherine attended UCLA to study biology and become a doctor, but she dropped out to model in Japan. When Catherine was in junior high, she programmed a computer video game.

questions.text: On what movie set did Catherine meet her future husband, Adam Beason?
questions.explanation:
Death Becomes Her.

	Catherine married Adam Beason on May 8, 1994. She and Adam met on the set of "Death Becomes Her" where they were both working; he was a production assistant and she was a body double. Catherine gave Adam her phone number, but he thought she was kidding about calling her.

questions.text: How much money did Catherine win when she played on  "The Match Game"?
questions.explanation:
$900.

	Catherine introduced herself as Cathy, the massage therapist, and won $900. She didn't make it the bonus round.

questions.text: What child actor did Catherine act alongside of in the movie "Cab To Canada"?
questions.explanation:
Haley Joel Osment.

	Catherine played a woman named Sandy, who befriended Bobby (Osment) after his mom skipped town. Maureen O'Hara and Jason Beghe also starred in the movie.

questions.text: Catherine guest starred as a news reporter in which of Jim Carrey's movies?
options: Eternal Sunshine For The Spotless Mind
questions.explanation:
Bruce Almighty.

	Catherine was allowed one week off of "JAG" to tape her scenes in "Bruce Almighty".

questions.text: What did Catherine name her first born daughter?
questions.explanation:
Gemma.

	Gemma Beason was born on April 16, 2003. Wendy Belissimo designed baby Gemma's nursery with a mural of a Tuscan countryside and a Ducanti motorcycle rider in it. Catherine taped the last few episodes of season 9 on "JAG" months early so she could go on maternity leave.

questions.text: Did Catherine guest star on "Hercules, The Legendary Journeys"?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Catherine played the evil Cynea and was killed on the third season episode, "The Lady and The Dragon".
